At this point, as Tuscon YELLED, Wheelie just glared, "Is that hte best =
that you can do?  Defend one who escalates for you?  Yes, I gave them a bit=
 of lip, they were the ones who attacked me quip for quip.  I ran my vocali=
zer, they went ot blows, that's called putting fists to someone's nose.  Th=
ey were teh ones who just went, to try and skewer me for time ill spent.  S=
o, if you're going to defend someone, who would assault another Autobot for=
 annoyance well done.  I would ask, is that what you want?  To let them esc=
alate and do whateve they want?  To know that they are immune, to being on =
whatever their tune?"

Wheelie went on, "I see now that you're no Prime.  A=
 Prime understands things most of the time.  A prime does not bully for his=
 own rank.  A Prime does not protect those who pick fights in the dank.  A =
Prime is worthy of respect, a Prime does not make others hit the deck.  If =
this is what you will do, make excuses for those around you.  Then I would =
say, I shall not give the same to you.  Until I see that you change what yo=
u do."

OOC Uhm, Quartz, Wheelie was basically giving your characters some =
sass, but then Rattrap and  Straight Shot then tried to assault him, which =
if it had worked would have sent him to the medbay, and now Tuscon is getti=
ng in Leo Prime's face for having attempted to stop Autobots from starting =
a fight in the medbay.  I'm aware he's your character and protecting his si=
ster, but I can't see this exactly as something a Prime would do. :)

And i=
n the future, please don't powerpose me, pranks or otherwise - especially w=
hen it comes to something that would inflict significant damage, liek slamm=
ing him into quills!
